# Test Document: Format V3 (Footnote Definitions)

This format uses markdown footnote syntax (Gene Therapy style).

## Body Text

Arrhythmogenic cardiomyopathy is characterized by fibrofatty replacement[^1]. Recent advances in gene therapy offer hope[^2].

The combination of genetic testing and imaging[^1][^2] provides comprehensive diagnosis.

## Citations

[^1]: James CA, Jongbloed JDH, Hershberger RE, et al. International Evidence-Based Reappraisal of Genes Associated With Arrhythmogenic Right Ventricular Cardiomyopathy. Circ Genom Precis Med. 2021;14(3):e003273. https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33831308/
[^2]: Corrado D, Perazzolo Marra M, Zorzi A, et al. Diagnosis of arrhythmogenic cardiomyopathy: The Padua criteria. Int J Cardiol. 2020;319:106-114. https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32561223/
